title.rendered: Top 12 Ethereum Development Companies In India, USA & UAE

content.rendered:
Ethereum is proving to be the game-changer for exchanging in digital trading currency, i.e., Cryptocurrency. It has wide usage for smart contracts that store data for third-party applications. So not irony to say it is a JACKPOT for companies looking to invest in it. The unique aspect is that it should maintain professional, smart contracts & blockchain development for strengthening your business operations quickly and in a hassle-free manner.

If you’re looking for a leading Ethereum development company, you need to make your decision wisely because it will lead to ground-breaking results and set the right tone for your business. So wouldn’t you like to invest with the best?

Here I have selected the best companies based on the factors mentioned below: 

Total Years Of Experience :

Before shortlisting the company first, check the companies/years of experience from when the company started rendering IT services to customers.

Employee Size:

The strength implies the business volume of the services/ ROI and infuses positive spirits to go ahead with any deserving brand.

Portfolio :

You must examine whether the company meets your needs and requirements; it is mandatory to look at its work and clientele and be analyzed by reviewing the work portfolio and successfully executing clients’ requirements.

Services Expertise :

Before you rope into any Ethereum development company, you should have a fair understanding of their service expertise, dedicated experience. It’s almost like touching gold when you find a suitable match for your high-stake projects, ensuring unprecedented success.

Going through testimonials, ratings, comments & other corporation details often work in your favor.  If you are deciding to hire Ethereum developer, you can go through social media channels LinkedIn, Facebook & Twitter to measure the depth of their credentials.

Hourly Price :

Pricing is a critical issue, especially during times when the outbreak has stagnated the business growth. For many companies, this is a recuperating phase where they don’t want to take any risks, especially investment. So choosing a company with compatible prices is in par with other factors like quality time taken.

In addition to the factors mentioned, I have also considered some other parameters such as employee size, technology expertise, IT infrastructure, team strength, work culture, digital presence, and online reputation to list the best company names.

Let’s Take A Look At Some Top Ethereum Development Companies:

1. PixelCrayons

PixelCrayons is an award-winning Digital Consulting & Engineering Firm offering end-to-end solutions to Enterprises, Digital Agencies, and Startups. Since 2004, PixelCrayons has serviced 5400+ customers from 38+ countries across the globe. They are based in Noida, India, and have a well-defined process that offers their customers a seamless working experience.

PixelCrayons, an Ethereum development company that has been in business for over 18 years, has continued to grow and has one of the industry’s best client retention rates. They ensure bug-free coding, easy communication, zero billing guarantee innovation lab, out-of-the-box solutions, and more.

Services Offered: Dedicated Development Teams, Software Development Outsourcing, Offshore Software Development, Staff Augmentation services, and more.

Key Pointer for PixelCrayons:

  • Total Years Of Experience: 18+
  • Location: India
  • Employee Size: 250 – 999
  • Avg. Price: Starting at $12-30/hr
  • Portfolio: NEXT, HP, eBay, Tesco, Citigroup, Puma, Kickers, Kraft Foods, Ted Baker London, Adobe, and more.

Also Read: How To Hire Software Developers: An In-Depth Guide

2. invertio

invertio has been delivering IT outsourcing services worldwide since 2004. We combine business domain knowledge, proven methodologies, and technology expertise with 450+ skilled software professionals to yield high-quality solutions that add business value. Keen interest in Blockchain makes them a leading Ethereum app development company, having undertaken no. of successful projects for global clients.

From startups to enterprises, products companies to digital agencies, and SMEs to Governments, they cater to all their diverse technology requirements.

19+ Years Experience |97% Client Retention | 2000+ Man-years Experience | 2500+ Satisfied Clients| |40+ Countries Served | Follow FTR Process

Services Offered: Wallet development, Blockchain dApp development, Ethereum consulting, Cryptocurrency development, Smart contract.

Key Pointers:

  • Total years of experience: 19+
  • Location: India
  • Employees Size: 250-999
  • Hourly Pricing: $25/hr
  • Portfolio: Candor, Capgemini, Novea, Track Opinion, Risk Logic, Dubai Police

3. Infograins Software Solutions Pvt. Ltd.

Founded in 2011, Infograins is an accomplished software development business that offers the creation of blockchain applications. They offer future-ready and innovative, cost-effective, secure, and transparent solutions. They have experience developing blockchain wallet apps, smart contracts, decentralized applications (dApp), cryptocurrency apps, and more.

Choose Infograins as your Ethereum development company for industry-specific experience, communication, support, source code ownership, quality development process, hassle-free recruitment, time zone compatibility, agile process, low development cost, and more.

Key Pointers for Infograins:

  • Total years of experience: 10+
  • Location: New York
  • Employees Size: 50-299
  • Hourly Pricing: $50 – $99 / hr
  • Portfolio: MX Diamonds, Gainpool, Decentralized Photo Album, Diamond Hands

4. XbSoftware

XB is a leading software development company working with the principle of delivering effective & robust solutions. The experience and expertise help them build custom web and mobile solutions, be it consulting, full-cycle software development & UI/UX design.

An innovative as well as outsourcing development firm necessary for operating Blockchain apps and smart contracts. The Ethereum app development enhances business consideration and avails top apps for blockchain development. 

Services Offered: Custom Software development, AI software development, Mobile app development, Cloud Software development, UI/UX development design.

Key Pointers:

  • Total Years Of Experience: 12
  • Location: United States, Canada, Belarus
  • Employee Size: 50-249
  • Avg. Price: $25 to $49
  • Portfolio: Google, BC, Samsung, Accenture, NASA, CISCO, Bank of America

5. Ethereum Labs

The company provides full-stack development that could bring blockchain technology and support forever. Ethereum app facilitates Blockchain technology and dApps for varied purposes.

The existing codes are managed & integrated to develop a possible solution and debug accordingly. Here, a dedicated team eliminates risk and carries operations with zero hassles.

Key Pointers:

  • Total Years Of Experience:17
  • Location: USA
  • Employee Size: 25-999
  • Hourly Pricing: $25
  • Projects:  Ethereum TV, Ether bazaar, EtherX, Ethereum Cash, Ethereum TV, Ether Logistics, Ether parts

6. Cubix

Cubix is a leading mobile app, games, and enterprise software development company! – expert in development, customization, and integration of complex enterprise-level solutions, business intelligence analytics, advanced web and mobile solutions. 

With over 10 years of experience, they have set up a dedicated Ethereum development team working with clients, including startups & organizations. The team is constantly striving in e-learning, IoT, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning and is known to deliver result-driven products for entrepreneurs, startups & enterprises.

Services Offered by Cubix: Mobile product strategy, Native iOS & Android development, React Native Cross-platform app development, Mobile 2D and 3D Game Development, AR and VR AI and ML Web and SaaS platform development, e-learning Solutions, UI and Front-end development, Testing & Quality assurance.

Key Pointers:

  • Total Experience: 12
  • Employee Size: 50-249
  • Hourly Pricing: $25 to $49/ hr

7. Openxcell

OpenXcell is a leading mobile app development company in the United States & India. The outsourcing model “ Valueshore” brings enhanced value to customers for better ROI. Incorporating the latest technologies in advanced mobile and web applications.

The critical factors of the ValueShore model are Quality, Cost-effective, Speed, Responsiveness, Risk Elimination, Scalability, ValueAdditon & Consistency. So far, Openxcell has designed & developed more than 700 software & mobile apps; visit the portfolio.

Services Offered by Openxcell: Mobile app design & development, Custom software development, Web application development, Scalable eCommerce & Retail, Website/Branding/ Conversion optimization, Enterprise Content Management System, Cloud deployment & maintenance, Staff Augmentation /Offshore Dedicated Team.

Key Pointers:

  • Total Years Of Experience: 11
  • Location: India, USA, UK, Canada, Aus
  • Employee Size  50-249
  • Hourly Pricing: $25
  • Portfolio: Motorola, Unilever, Google India, University of Florida

8. Zab Technologies

Zab Technologies is the premier Blockchain Development Company delivering a wide variety of Crypto & Blockchain Services for clients across the globe. Being an early adopter in the industry, the Ethereum developers provide unique solutions while assisting global entrepreneurs in reaping huge profits!

They are an experienced set of expert professionals who available 24*7 and coming up with feasible solutions that apply right from startups to enterprises worldwide!

Services Offered by Zab Technologies: Cryptocurrency Exchange Software Development (White Label Crypto Exchange Software & Exchange, Software Development from scratch), STO (Security Token Offering) Development, ICO (Initial Coin Offering) Development, IEO (Initial Exchange Offering) Launchpad, Altcoin Creation, Token Development, Cryptocurrency Wallet Development.

Key Pointers:

  • Total Years Of Experience:5
  • Location: India, USA, UAE
  • Employee Size: 50-249
  • Hourly Pricing:  $25 to $49/hr
  • Portfolio:  inv365.com, Coinsdrawer A-nex.io, Thore Exchange

9. Fuelled

An award-winning technology consulting Ethereum development company that transforms business by generating ideas, building products, and accelerating growth.

Fuelled specializes in designing and developing mobile(iOS & Android) and elegant, seamless website development that is fast, attractive, responsive, and easy to use. It works with an unwavering passion for perfection, and quality.

Services Offered by Fuelled: Digital Transformation, Enterprise Application Development, App Development, Web Development, Design UI/UX, Next-Gen Tech Specialities.

Key Pointers:

  • Total Years of Experience: 13
  • Location: USA, UK
  • Employee Size: 50-249
  • Hourly Pricing: $150- $199
  • Portfolio: MGM Resorts International, 9Gag, Harvard, Rite Aid, Verizon, Crunchbase, Afterlight, QuizUp, Summit Series, Barneys, Happify, Sunnycomb, Matador

10. Solu Lab

Solu Lab is an award-winning software solution provider for full-spectrum, 360- degree services to start-ups, small and large enterprises.

They harness emerging technologies such as Cloud, Chatbot, Blockchain, IoT, Artificial Intelligence, Augmented & Virtual Reality, Machine Learning, and more.

They are top-notch blockchain development companies with more than 50 M+ active users for their apps with a highly competitive 97 % customer success score. Here, the developers are partnered with Fortune 500 enterprises to high-growth start-ups.

Services Offered by Solu Lab: dApps development, STO development, Hyperledger Blockchain, Cryptocurrency Wallet, ICO cryptocurrency, progressive web apps, Machine learning development, Data Science, IoT development, DevOps services, SaaS development & maintenance, Cross-platform app designing, Python development, DevOps Services.

Key Pointers:

  • Total Years of Experience: 7
  • Location: India, USA, Aus, Canada
  • Employee Size: 50-249
  • Hourly Pricing: $25 to $49
  • Portfolio: Casting Workbook, Cambridge University, Goldman Sachs, Citrix Systems

11. Appinventiv

Appinventiv is an award-winning organization that provides impeccable technology solutions from start-up to Fortune 500 companies. The Ethereum development company started its journey way back in 2015 with impeccable technology solutions. Now, they have 650+ tech experts, engineers, and Ethereum developers strive forward and bridging the gap between ideas and reality. The company intends to enrich the customer experience with smart & innovative moves.

Services Offered:  Blockchain(Ethereum, Hyperledger Fabric, EOS), Product discovery Workshops, Android app development, Blockchain development, Flutter app development, React Native app development.

Key Pointers:

  • Total Years of Experience: 7
  • Location: India, USA, UAE, AUS
  • Employee Size:250-999
  • Hourly Pricing: $25 to $49
  • Portfolio: United Nations Khaleez Times, Next g TV, Kmart GSMA, Super Tech Dainik Bhaskar 

12. Prolitus Technologies

Prolitus Technologies is an  ISO 9001-2008 and ISO 27001-2013 Ethereum app development company committed to developing flexible, scalable, and robust Odoo ERP solutions for various industries like manufacturing, engineering, retail & e-commerce, education, shipping, intermodal, service, food & hospitality, healthcare, finance, media, etc.

The company has a strong presence in the USA with delivery centers across Delhi/NCR(India), making them a global IT solution provider for customized solutions based on Open source ERP/Odoo. 

It streamlines business process productivity, efficiency and reduces operational cost.

Services Offered By Prolitus: Mobile & Web app development, User Interface/ User Experience, Security Testing, Blockchain development, Cloud Solutions, Web & Mobile development.

Key Pointers:

  • Total years of experience:16
  • Location: USA, UAE, QATAR, India
  • Employee Size: 250-999
  • Hourly Pricing: $25 to $49
  • Portfolio: Plush, Xeikon, Dalmia Private Ltd. Maharaja Express 

Why Choose Ethereum dApps Development Companies?

People worldwide are joining hands with the best companies and helping enterprises identify business needs and render solutions accordingly. So understandably hiring, an Ethereum developer will provide you with maximum advantages for Ethereum development.

These companies operate under professional expertise for Ethereum blockchain application development and Blockchain development services. Moreover, it helps deliver the best app development services at the top level.

Most people seize the opportunity with both hands, and best-class companies fulfill business needs and provide solutions accordingly. Moreover, apps required to execute the development are necessary for acquiring the Ethereum dApp and blockchain app developments forever. It carries out app requirements and business objectives smoothly.

On the other hand, it involves challenging tasks that could deliver outstanding results with experienced staff. And is taken at an almost affordable cost, and it involves numerous user-friendly apps for business and other solutions.

Final Notes:

HERE WE GO! The case study will prove a stepping stone— to choose notable brands and hire Ethereum developers for dedicated projects. I gained insight while drafting this blog and got inclined towards invertio, Appinventiv, & Prolitus Technologies. So take advantage and transform business processes using Ethereum development. Since you will be investing in projects, you should have this privilege to go through soft research if you want to know more and subscribe to their services.
